modName: White and Grey Royal Elven Set
summary: White and Grey retex of the Royal Elven Set by theRoadstroker.
descriptionHtml:
White and Grey Royal Elven Set re-texture by CrimsonFairy

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Description
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This mod is a re-texture of theRoadstroker's Royal Elven Set. I originally made a purple and blue one, but I got a few requests for a white and grey set. It kinda turned out to be more white and silver than white and grey but I actually like it like that. And I actually like it better than the first re-texture I did! It still needs the original mod by theRoadstroker though.

I'm TERRIBLE at creating screenshots, so it would be nice to see some of yours!


Note: This was requested by a few people and I only did it because I ended up liking the idea. I'm not doing any more re-textures for this mod, so please don't request anything else. If there is a problem with the texture then I'll fix it but I'm not going to make the texture a higher or lower quality so please don't ask.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Requirements
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Just the original mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25083/]here[/url].

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Install
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Extract files from archive into Skryim data folder. Click yes to all, and when asked if you want to overwrite file, click yes/move and replace.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Uninstall
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Go to Data/Textures/armor/theRoadstroker/ElfArmor and then delete ElfArmor_diff.dds or overwrite it with the original texture.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Credits
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bethesda for making Skyrim.
theRoadstroker for his AMAZING work in the original mod.
Frederick Durand (Zoberraz). Producer, QA (Quality Assurance), and support.
And the Nexus creators and staff for their awesome website.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Usage
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
You are not allowed to upload this mod to any other site without my and theRoadstroker's permission. And you are not allowed to use this in any of your own mods without theRoadstroker's permission either.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Bugs
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
The texture works fine for me but if you have any problems/bugs then please let me know so that I can adress them as quickly as possible!
author: CrimsonFairy
